org.apache.jackrabbit.core.nodetype
Interface NodeDef

All Superinterfaces:
ItemDef
All Known Implementing Classes:
NodeDefImpl
public interface NodeDef
extends ItemDef

NodeDef is the internal representation of a node definition. It refers to Names only and is thus isolated from session-specific namespace mappings.

See Also:
NodeDefinition
